# Opal Art

Gathers beautiful art. Perhaps as beautiful as [Opal](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Opal).

## Installing

```bash
$ pip install opalart
```

## Quick Start

```python
>>> import opalart
>>> client = opalart.yandere()
>>> image = await client.randpost(['thighhighs'])
# Do stuff with the image
```
